mean_cn: adj.集体的，共同的；  n.集体
mean_en: done or shared by all members of a group of people; involving a whole group or society; used to refer to all members of a group
sentence: Class fund is collective property. It needs everybody to contribute.
sentence_trans: 班费是集体财产，它需要每个人的贡献。
word_etyma: col一起 + lect选择，收集 + ive……的 → 集中到一起 → 集体的
